text: I had a father who was a gambler he had
enormous energy the energy wasn't always
used well
he said penny just stay in your room I'm
going to kill your mother the next
morning we walked past our house and
every door and window in the house have
been smashed
I've been trying to put that house back
together for the last 4050 years
it's a very background that I have to
thank for trying to find tranquility and
peace
this is a quarter-sized reproduction of
the liverpool cityscape it was
commissioned to celebrate being european
city of culture ten people working five
days a week
ultimately the number of hours comes to
around 60,000 over the three-year period
which is equivalent to approximately 18
years for one person
lots of people stand in front of the
paintings and they say I just don't know
how you do it I turn around and say I
don't know how I've done it I am a
perfectionist there is only one way of
doing things and it's the right way and
the right way is is it good enough
no is it perfect that's the right way
twenty-five stencils in total for this
this is number one so 24 more layers to
go down on top of here before the
stencil we have to have a drawing and
the drawing could probably take three
weeks for those columns we then have to
break that drawing down into the twenty
five stencils
but of course the stencil has got to be
cut and that's going to be maybe two
days per stencil we then have the color
mixing which goes into the making of
that column I've never thought about
having fun it's it's what I do
I mean I've I've been doing it for so
long to me it's just the way that keeps
me saying concentration brings about an
extraordinary stability in one's life
and many of us come from less stable
backgrounds than we might have liked to
me my paintings wouldn't be the
paintings they wear unless I had booked
that much time I think people understand
effort because nobody's life is easy and
everybody works very hard
obsessive of course it is
